messages.content: Hello? My dad and my uncle just got shot.
Okay, calm down. Two people shot at this time. What happened? Tell me exactly what happened.
They came in and then they left. Someone tried to catch them. They really shot him.
Okay. Did you see the person who did it?
No. I didn't see their faces. They had bandanas covering them.
Did you see if they were white or black?
I couldn't tell, but we're in a black neighborhood.
Okay. Which way did they go?
I don't know. My dad is just sitting there, and the local police told me to get on the ground.
All right. The paramedics and the police are on the way. Did the suspect leave the scene yet?
Oh, my God. Yes, they left about an hour ago.
All right. It seems clear. Suspects are described as black males wearing bandanas.
Did you see if they left in a vehicle?
I don't know. My husband just told me to get on the ground.
Okay, stay on the line with me. The police are almost there.
The police are now there. You can go ahead and hang up with me now.
